<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104983</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104983</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Story - Personal Narrative </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meine Geschichte - Persönliche Darstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon Histoire - Récit Personnel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minha História - Narrativa Pessoal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Mia Storia - Descrizione Personale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιστορία μου - προσωπικό αφήγημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi Historia - Narrativa Personal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Student will compose a narrative that explores a time when their lives were affected by tobacco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer besteht eine Darstellung, die eine 
Zeit erforscht, als ihre Lebensdauern durch Tabak beeinflußt wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étudiant composera un récit qui explore un 
moment où leurs vies ont été affectées par le tabac.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estudante comporá uma narrativa que explore uma
época em que suas vidas forem afetadas pelo tabaco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo comporrà una descrizione che esplora un
periodo in cui le loro vite sono state influenzate da tabacco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σπουδαστής θα συνθέσει ένα αφήγημα που ερευνά έναν
χρόνο όταν επηρεάστηκαν οι ζωές τους από τον καπνό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estudiante compondrá una narrativa que explore
una época en que sus vidas fueron afectadas por el tabaco.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201846</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

    <name>

    <item>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
